name: Moving Target Double KB Complex
description: The 'Moving Target' double kettlebell complex from @kb_kings (via @alexkaru). Swing → Clean → Snatch flowing together, with descending snatch reps each round (3-2-1). Don't set the bells down.

exercises.notes: Single bell, warm up the clean and overhead position
Flow directly into cleans — don't set bells down
Rack position, then straight into snatches
Punch through at the top. 3 snatches this round.
Same flow — swing into clean into snatch
2 snatches this round — the target is moving
1 snatch — one big explosive rep to finish

tips: Requires TWO kettlebells of equal weight
The 'moving target' = snatch reps decrease each round: 3 → 2 → 1
Do NOT set the bells down during each round — continuous flow
Master single-bell snatches before attempting double snatches
Start lighter than you think — double snatches are humbling
Rest between rounds as needed — quality over speed
